title: Werealligator

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have detection immunity, but only on non-full moon nights
- You share a factional chat with other Were members
- Your new moon results are shared with the other Were members
**Hunting Moon Enhancement: Death Roll**
Your attack is upgraded to powerful, and you attack and clean a visitor to your target as well.
